metadata.title: CVE-2021-47149 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: fujitsu: fix potential null-ptr-derefIn fmvj18x_get_hwinfo(), if ioremap fails there will be NULL pointerderef. To fix this, check the return value of ioremap and return -1to the caller in case of failure.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
